title: New bus shelter construction
description: Construction of a modern bus shelter with seating, lighting, and route information boards to improve commuter experience.

title: Road resurfacing near CBT
description: Resurfacing of damaged road stretch near CBT to reduce traffic congestion and accidents during peak hours.

title: Underground electricity cabling
description: Replacement of overhead electric lines with underground cabling to reduce power failures and improve safety.

title: Drainage improvement project
description: Improvement of storm water drainage system to prevent flooding in low-lying residential areas.

title: Smart traffic signal installation
description: Installation of adaptive traffic signals to optimize vehicle flow and reduce congestion at major intersections.

title: Storm water drain repair
description: Repair and desilting of damaged storm water drains to prevent overflow during heavy rainfall.

title: Ring Road Resurfacing & Lane Marking
description: Resurfacing of the damaged ring road stretch with fresh asphalt, repainting lane markings, installation of reflectors, and minor drainage correction to prevent waterlogging during monsoon. The project aims to reduce accidents and improve traffic flow on the airport-bound route.
delayReason: Heavy rainfall and delayed supply of asphalt materials from contractor
